name: Navyblue and the Spectrum Killers
description: Jump, Shoot and Dash throughout the city, choosing which crisis to solve first as you gain new powers and fight your way through legions of evil robots and thugs as you try to save the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Triple-core Intel or AMD, 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 460 GTX or AMD Radeon 5870 HD series or higher Mobile: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580M or higher. Storage: 500 MB available space
